meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rich Blashka Alyssa Mondelli Susan Corica Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7571.

td.p: Rich Blashka, an attorney from New York, New York
Alyssa Mondelli, a forensic scientist from St. Paul, Minnesota
Susan Corica, a journalist from Waterbury, Connecticut (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,995)

tr.td: THE PRESIDENTIAL VERSE OF RICHARD ARMOUR
ADJECTIVES
MAKES SENSE
MIXED GREENS
ONLINE LEARNING
EVERYBODY "PAY"S

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This man "was a tall man, a lanky six-feet-four. he had to duck a little when coming through a door"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This man "was a tall man, a lanky six-feet-four. he had to duck a little when coming through a door"

DRESS LIKE WOMEN
CENTRAL AMERICA
(Alex: You have to give us the performer who sang each tune in the movie in...)

THE "L" IT IS!
